name: Scrublander
description:
Demo of Scrublander. An FPS MOBA where players not only defend their lanes with their character, but also spawn mobs and build towers to hold off the enemy and push toward their shield generator. 

Game is in pre-alpha. This is a proof of concept that’s buggier than a Bethesda game on launch day. *

Game is currently using placeholder art as we prove out the gameplay and finish developing the art style. 

*We love Bethesda games. That was a joke for those who missed that.
